text: Georg Hegner (24 June 1897 - 17 February 1985) was a Danish fencer. He competed in four events at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1897 births Category:1985 deaths Category:Danish male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Denmark Category:Fencers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Copenhagen
title: Georg Hegner
